recent_addresses.name: CEX EVMS Address Analysis
recent_addresses.description: The purpose of retrieving all data from the cex_evms.addresses table is to analyze and understand the distribution, activity, and characteristics of addresses interacting with centralized exchanges (CEX) on Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible networks.

solana_blocks.name: CEX EVMS Address Analysis (Alternative)
solana_blocks.description: Alternative query for CEX EVMS addresses with different parameters
solana_blocks.example_sql: SELECT issuer, address, ticker AS etf_ticker, track_inflow, track_outflow, inverse_values FROM dune.hildobby.dataset_bitcoin_etf_addresses INNER JOIN dune.hildobby.dataset_bitcoin_etf_metadata USING (issuer)
